column3: I am wondering if we should move the policy description from the website to this repo. Maybe it can be removed from the website, or the html generated from the document in this repo.
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16164/commits/d7c054277798cc1975041eb19c679cd07c412d68. This seems to make sense.

ACK 

> I am wondering if we should move the policy description from the website to this repo. Maybe it can be removed from the website, or the html generated from the doument in this repo.

Maybe, though the one in this repository only concerns security, which releases will still receive security updates. The one on the website is more general, and concerns other backports as well.
I like the idea of bringing that info into, say, doc/versions-lifecycle.md or similar, and linking to it in doc/release-process.md.
